stripped_text: When you install this resource and whenever a run begins, place 1 credit on this resource. When there are 6 or more hosted credits, take all credits from this resource, trash it, and draw 1 card.
text:
When you install this resource and whenever a run begins, place 1[credit] on this resource.
When there are 6 or more hosted credits, take all credits from this resource, trash it, and draw 1 card.
title: Side Hustle
